name: Cream off the Crop
description:
Yum! Some of the hay bales (which are heavy... do not get crushed!) are covered in cream. They are white until you lick the cream off them (you are a dog). Don't let the cream bales get away! If the cream bales fall into the void with the cream still on them, you lose a life. Watch out for other objects, too! w,a,s,d to move, space to jump, mouse to look around, and left-click to lick! Be a good dog and have fun!

I made this game for the Curdle Jam #10 in three days. Music loops from Garageband. Game over music by Phillip Schlosser (youtube).
